successes.title: FlyKly Smart Wheel
successes.description: Lightweight  and highly efficient all-in-one design pedal assist that fits on practically any bicycle.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU - Get listed as a supporter on the FlyKly website. Please share our project and help us spread the word!
FLYKLY SMART LIGHT - Receive a bicycle light, a phone holder AND a phone charger - all combined in one single device!
FLYKLY SMART WHEEL “EARLY BIRD” - Our first 100 supporters can get their Smart Wheel AND Smart Light at a very special price!
FLYKLY SMART WHEEL - Get your very own Smart Wheel with Smart Light included! Worldwide shipping included.

FLYKLY SMART WHEEL “HACKER” EDITION - For the most enthusiastic developers we prepared an edition with SDK so you can start creating your own apps for the Smart Wheel right away. Worldwide shipping included.
